website_summaries.verdict: Budget-friendly and lightweight option featuring a thick, stay-put elastic band.
pros: Can be worn on its own beneath clothing or with clear bra straps that are included
Available in four shades, so many women buy more than one
Holds up well to regular machine washing
cons: Sizing includes only the circumference and not the cup size, so it doesn't fit every wearer well

customer_reviews.title: Perfect strapless bra!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra! I have had tube-top style bra's before, but they flatten my breasts and make them weird-shaped under clothes. The support in this bra keeps the shape, while maintaining support, and looks great under all clothes! For me, as a slightly larger, bust woman, you do get a little 'snug' around the armpits, but it isn't noticeable under a tank top or sleeveless top.
customer_reviews.author: Demagoguer

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Being a nursing mom I needed a strapless bra that I could wear under maxi dresses for the summer that gave enough support and fit my newly endowed chest. I’m about 34/36D so to be safe I bought size 36. It’s perfect. Of course it’s not going to boost the girls up but definitely gives enough support where I don’t feel like they’re hanging down to my stomach. The material is thick and shiny, the padding is just enough for protection. The bonus is the top portion of the bra isn’t the type that squeezes your underarm fat!! Cannot beat the price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Oh

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit properly
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like this at all. The pads in the bra literally horrible. I don’t recommend you buying this. It is also very uncomfortable and it doesn’t even stay up so if you want to look like Alissa violet on that song with rice gum then go ahead and buy it. The material is nice if only the pads are too.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Bugbee

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to put on and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put on and comfortable. But it does start to slide a bit (like every other strapless bra I own) and if i bend over it'll often slide straight down under my chest so I had to keep fixing it.. Fine to wear for a day at the office where I don't need to move around much. I'm a 36B and ordered according to my size.
customer_reviews.author: V. Yang

customer_reviews.title: got me through my best friend's wedding day with no issues at all
customer_reviews.text: I know there are some reviews that say the bra is small. I will agree that it is tight, but then again, it is a strapless bra and I would rather it be tight than it fall down. I am also a B cup so this fits perfectly, got me through my best friend's wedding day with no issues at all, and I will definitely use it again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Shen

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place without smooshing
customer_reviews.text: This is a good strapless bra for the money. The only downside is getting in and out of it, which requires some wriggling. It stays in place all day and only gets a little tight-feeling at the end of the day. There isn't the "uniboob" look because it is lined with foam shapes. It looks natural and overall is comfortable. I got it in black lace and would get it again if I needed another strapless.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great for blouses!
customer_reviews.text: I am relatively busty (36C) and have always had a hard time wearing button down blouses because of that annoying gap between the buttons in the chest area. With this bandeau, I can wear any blouse perfectly with no gap and a smooth front. Also does a nice job of eliminating bra lines in the back. I got a 36C and I think the top fits true to size. Great purchase, at a great price. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: castba85

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Way too tight. Plus, there's a built in cup, so those of us with a little more than an A/B, find it uncomfortable. I'm returning the other one I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am happy with the product. However I am not 100% pleased that it doesn’t stay in place. I will have to use the straps that were provided (wanted strapless).
customer_reviews.author: Catlady

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: i tried it on in kohl's and found it much cheaper on amazon. I should have bought more of these earlier on. Personally, I'm petite enough to wear this with shorts and sandals during this summer with a cute hat. Its so comfortable, Im gonna buy it in beige and white too.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I dont know what its suppose to be like...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a strapless bra but this one does not support and it falls down. I do not use it often but only for short amount of times.
customer_reviews.author: Loved.Saved

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but unflattering
customer_reviews.text: This was comfortable, but not flattering. My husband said it made my boobs look flat and saggy. I'm a 34C and not saggy, so this takes something good and makes it look sad. It is comfortable so if that is all you are looking for this could work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality strapless bra but not for my 36dds it squished me down and was very tight and uncomfortable. I would think smaller sizes would work better with this bra
customer_reviews.author: Wahlee

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product, and I'm surprised since this is Maidenform
customer_reviews.text: Not a great product, and I'm surprised since this is Maidenform. I am a size 34C and so I ordered accordingly and the bra was way too tight on my chest, it felt like a compression sleeve rather than a bandeau. I would avoid this if you are over a A or small B cup size.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: It's not great
customer_reviews.text: This isn't for larger gals. I have D cups and just wanted something for modesty around the house. It's not even worth that. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: I like this product but the cup size was a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but the cup size was a bit bigger than I expected so I have some gapping. the ribcage measurements are perfect though and it doesnt slip down at all once in place.
customer_reviews.author: Elynn H.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay up
customer_reviews.text: No support at all. I’m a 34d with a small frame and purchased a medium. It doesn’t even come close to staying up. The fabric is great quality and silky soft, but the bra rolls over. Doesn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I have a large bust and never expect ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have a large bust and never expect much from bras like this, but it gives good coverage without falling out the bottom. Will probably order another in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Seam undone after one wash
customer_reviews.text: Washed this before I was going to wear it. I washed it on the gentle cycle in a garment bag and when I took it out to hang it to dry one of the seams had come undone. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Chaos Coordinater

customer_reviews.title: Slides around
customer_reviews.text: The bra slides around a lot and I have to constantly adjust it, not exactly what I was hoping for. But the seller was great and very efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and enough support for
customer_reviews.text: Have been wearing these bras since mastectomy for 2 1/2 years as straps bother me where “port” was for chemo. I’m average wearing a 36 so works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and better than underwire.
customer_reviews.text: This wasn’t a bad purchase, Pretty much as expected. I Like that the fabric is soft And this is way better than an underwire strapless bra. Comfort wise I give it a thumbs up, but it does slip a little like every strapless bra.
customer_reviews.author: T. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Not worth even the low price
customer_reviews.text: The pads inside this bra are what make this bra so terrible. It also doesn’t fit correctly - it runs much smaller than it states. I constantly have to adjust it and that is just in the trying on of the item. Sigh. I had high hope for this one. But apparently too high. I need to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber J.

customer_reviews.title: Great price but wish the cup size was a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price but wish the cup size was a bit larger. The band fits well (I ordered a 34) but I have a larger cup size and find that I overwhelm the cups so it causes some slipping down or out.
customer_reviews.author: jbam

customer_reviews.title: Great off shoulder bra....buy it without any doubt
customer_reviews.text: This is great inner wear. Buy it without any doubt.it stays on nice. I am a 34 c and a 34 fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me, I wasn't comfortable that bra was going to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Ep

customer_reviews.title: Just right for over shoulder tops!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this strapless bra for over shoulder tops. It is very comfortable and reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this, its so tiny they are encouraging the idea that only thin is in.
customer_reviews.text: So small that I couldn't even get it on. This is not the size advertised in the least!!! and the management isn't helpful at all!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Runs small- band size does not equate for size of cups. Makes for an uncomfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Carq

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 38B and it is a horrible fit. I measure a 36A and decided to ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 38B and it is a horrible fit. I measure a 36A and decided to order up fot comfort for my daughters's wedding. Almost seems like i needed a 40B in this brand. Unfortunately because I put it on for my fitting i can not retirn it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great strapless nursing bra
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for one that I could nurse easily with but that wasn't already stretched out after the first use. This was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love this bandeau. Super comfy. Material is light and stretchy. Stays put too!
customer_reviews.author: tdblock

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute but if you have bigger boobs this is not for you. One jump and they pop out 😭
customer_reviews.author: Shahminah

customer_reviews.title: The band is oddly large and the straps are too ...
customer_reviews.text: The band is oddly large and the straps are too wide set in the front. They sit right in crevice of the armpit. No support.
customer_reviews.author: Emily LBW

customer_reviews.title: Saggy boobs
customer_reviews.text: It makes you have saggy boobs and is hard to adjust to get it to stay at the right spot.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cups don't hold their shape
customer_reviews.text: The material looks ok but the cup does not hold the shape. It doesn't look good on me.
customer_reviews.author: Annie M.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for bigger busts!
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made, fits around my body as expected, but the width of the band and the built in cups do NOT allow for bigger busts to fit. Was not usable for me bc of this.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very ugly. Looks cheap and you can see the padding through the fabric
customer_reviews.author: Kellie phillips

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy, stays up great and love that it has padding!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $10!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this. The white shows through everything, it doesn’t stay up, and the top stays folded over.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This strapless bra is so good!! I have been trying to find one just like it. It has light padding and is tight yet comfortable to support bust. I am typically a 36C and this bra fits perfect with decent support.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Material felt very cheap and flimsy. Offered no support and I have a small bust size. I returned this bra.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bra Fit
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 34C bra size & ordered a 34, but it fits snug & pushes me down.
customer_reviews.author: Mazzei281

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I haven't actually worn this yet, but just from trying it on, it's a little smaller than I expected and the top tends to roll down. Not a lot of support, which I didn't really expect. We'll see how everything stays put once I get the opportunity to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WAY too big
customer_reviews.text: So bummed I missed the return window. This product fits me TERRIBLY. Both pads make my boobs look so weird since it didn't fit right. i ordered a small and the product was way too big.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Menard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome fit & perfect under summer loose fit tanks & dresses
customer_reviews.author: LISA TASCON

customer_reviews.title: Not for anyone with larger breasts
customer_reviews.text: This was a great quality bra but I have a small D cup and this bra just did not cut it ): Sadly had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler James Start

customer_reviews.title: This bra was horrible. It smooched my girls down into little cones
customer_reviews.text: This bra was horrible. It smooched my girls down into little cones. Not flattering and not supportive. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort Bra
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable strapless bra i have had in a long time
customer_reviews.author: T.Gorman

customer_reviews.title: May work better for smaller rib caged gals
customer_reviews.text: To small for me. Gave me the dreaded uniboob. The tup band wanted to roll down. Got Xl and I am a 40B. May work better for smaller rib caged gals. The search continues for me
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: runs small
customer_reviews.text: The medium ran small for me, 36, b-c, but seemed to be shaped well and lightly padded
customer_reviews.author: Kimberoo

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to rave about. I bought this thinking it would be more comfortable than a regular strapless bra but I find it slides down too much. Probably wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfy for smaller chest.
customer_reviews.text: Love the fabric but boobs get squashed and flattened okay if you are smaller
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, stays in place and perfect fit! I wear a 38C and I bought the 38 which was the right size for me.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Order a Size Up
customer_reviews.text: I would order a size up from what you think you need. And without the clear straps, the cups tend to creep down. I love the clear straps though they kind of come off easy. While at the airport, one of mine came undone in the back and I couldn't do a thing about it as I was getting on a plane and just had to remove the whole strap.
customer_reviews.author: M. Spahr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these for summer. Very comfortable and stay in place!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A.White

customer_reviews.title: Fits fine.
customer_reviews.text: Fit fine. Probably better for smaller cheated women since there's not much support. I'm a D cup.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase, most of these type bras are so uncomfortable with wires.
customer_reviews.text: Little tight but think next size up would be to large. I am 34 D and bought 36.
customer_reviews.author: Concetta

customer_reviews.title: Weird padding
customer_reviews.text: Padding folded weirdly on top, leaving a sharp angle. Maybe my bust is too small, but it's very strange looking, so I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. Fits well and very comfortable. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee B.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Strange fit for me. There are breast cups in there that looked very fake and weird when on.
customer_reviews.author: Mara Glad

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: comfortable support but kinda flattens your chest, doesn't enhance FYI
customer_reviews.author: LProcks

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way too small and flattens my chest! I'll give it to someone who it will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: I purchase a size up and it was still didn’t fit well....
customer_reviews.author: vicky theodore

customer_reviews.title: gave good support for larger busts without uncomfortable wires and was ...
customer_reviews.text: Used while pregnant, gave good support for larger busts without uncomfortable wires and was smooth under clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made and has clear detachable straps, but runs very, very small.
customer_reviews.author: GTravella

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and comfortable! Exactly what I was looking for. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robin K Chandley

customer_reviews.title: your body must be made to wear these
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, unless you're flat-chested or have zero-fat these bras never fit
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This bra fits me perfectly, I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 36 band size bra, and bought a 36 but this one is just a little snug. I would suggest women with larger cup sizes go with a band size up on this particular piece. It works well enough, but really needs straps to make it hold in place. It, fortunately, has loops for detachable straps The included straps are the sticky clear plastic ones, that I'm sure many people love. I'm not so fond of them, and I use a pink halter bathing suit strap to hold it in place and it works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Penn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like these strapless bras much more than the underwire kind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should have read reviews first
customer_reviews.text: This bra does not stay up at all without straps I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: MAIDENFORM BANDEAU BRA
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE A LOT OF BANDEAUS. I WANTED ONE THAT WAS MORE SILKY UNDER MY CLOTHES. I LOVE IT IT GIVES ME GOOD SUPPORT AND FITS WELL. I PLAN ON WEARING IT OVER MY CAMISOLE. I WILL JUST LET THE STRAPS DROP AND IT WILL BE A STRAPLESS CAMISOLE. I HAVE LOOKED AND LOOKED FOR A CAMISOLE TO WEAR UNDER MY SPAGHETTI STRAPPED DRESSES. I COULD ONLY FIND SHAPE WEAR BUT NO SLIP LIKE STRAPLESS CAMISOLE. SO I MADE MY OWN. AND IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: HONEY

customer_reviews.title: Excellent strapless bra
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this comfortable, smooth fitting bra at such a great price too! It supports and shapes. I have the black and will be getting one in beige.
customer_reviews.author: yogasiss

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The fit was nice. I'm in between a b-c and the 34 fit fine. Comfortable...no under wire. My only complaint is the very top of the bust area the fabric slightly folds down, so it does not have that seamless look. Overall happy with the product and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable Strapless Bra
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable strapless bra I have ever worn. It fits great does not roll down and it feels wonderful to finally be free of painful underwire!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Vigil

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: im a 32 DDD and def does not fit those big of boobs, prob fits a-c not any bigger
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Scoville

customer_reviews.title: Great Strapless
customer_reviews.text: I have a really hard time finding strapless bras and I bought this to go under some of my summer tanks that are a bit opaque and colored bras would show through. Fits well and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsy M. Carranza

customer_reviews.title: great bra for summer
customer_reviews.text: Fits great - much more comfy than a wire-bra. I wore it with a maxi sundress with elastic type top.
customer_reviews.author: sunnyandie

customer_reviews.title: I ended up returning this product. Its cut lower ...
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this product. Its cut lower in the back than the front and would start to move down my body. Felt awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bra but I ordered too small
customer_reviews.text: I guess cause I ordered the wrong size, it smashes my chest down and doesn't feel comfortable as I hoped it would.
customer_reviews.author: L. Shehab

customer_reviews.title: ...don't like it
customer_reviews.text: i have it, so i'll wear it. but, i wouldn't recommend it. CONs because there's no rubber/elastic on the inside top of the bandeau, it constantly rolls over AND slides down. it comes with clear straps, but i personally don't like that idea. (when i'm strapless, i want to be completely strapless.) PROs the bottom banding is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: aya

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product, but order AT LEAST one size larger.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product, but order AT LEAST one size larger.
customer_reviews.author: 99milesaway

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, comfortable, strapless bra!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this bra prior! Loved it so much, I ordered three more. Being strapless (or not if you so choose) makes them extremely comfortable. No extra bulky padding, no under-wire, fits beautifully, keep their shape handwash after handwash, enhance the appearance of my bustline. This is the finest bra ever created!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ms67GTO

customer_reviews.title: It worked but not flattering
customer_reviews.text: If your goal is to be flattened for whatever reason this is your product. It was snug and did not move however it did not compliment the womanly form and the nice strapless dress with this bra gave the appearance I was very flat and I am a D cup. So depending on how you want to use the product it could work just not for a dress where you want to appear like a woman in it.
customer_reviews.author: Christie D. Lamoreaux

customer_reviews.title: Worthless bra
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in size 36, as I am a 36C. The bra falls down without the straps and there is zero support. My girls sag as though I'm not wearing a bra, so I'd be better off without this stupid thing. Had I sized down to, say, a 32, maybe this thing would have offered some support out of sheer tightness. But then there's the whole breathing thing. I kind of like breathing. It's going back.
customer_reviews.author: J. Labonte

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly! It helped cover the gap in my sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Maidenform Women's The Dream Collection Bandeau Contour Bra
product_meta.description: Embrace comfort with a new standard, a bandeau that feels like second skin. Sheen fabric caresses the body with buttery softness, and beneath the fabric's surface are hidden features that smooth and support. Fit and flexibility are never sacrificed in the dream collection bandeau.
feature_bullets: Wire-free bandeau with foam-lined cups is a must-have!
Clear adjustable straps included for multiple looks
Converts to criss-cross, halter, and traditional
No closure - goes on over the head
